name: 心鏡曼荼羅
body:
## About me
### soma\_arc
I'm developing software about Fractal and Kleinian groups. Visualized Kleinian groups has fractal structure and it is very beautiful. Many people have been fascinated by it. There already have been software about them. However, many of these are legacy, not well documented, or not published themselves. One of the my purpose is to summarize existing works and re-implement them.  

### Interests
+ Kleinian groups
+ Fractal
+ Common Lisp
+ Computer Graphics
+ Goa Trance

### Location
Nakano, Tokyo

### Links
+ Github: [soma-arc](https://github.com/soma-arc)  
+ Twitter: [soma_arc](https://twitter.com/soma_arc)

## Projects
Some projects are not considered public use, so please wait for completion.

### [Kleinian Walker](https://github.com/soma-arc/KleinianWalker)
Software drawing orbit of transformed figures and the limit set of Kleinian groups. It is inspired by [bugman123](http://bugman123.com/Fractals/index.html).  
![walker](./images/walker.png)
+ [Repository on GitHub](https://github.com/soma-arc/KleinianWalker)

### [Rosarium (Under construction)]()
You will learn and draw Kleinian groups on web.
It will be published at [rosarium.website](rosarium.website)
+ [Repository on Github](https://github.com/soma-arc/Rosarium_web)

### [K-Visions](https://github.com/soma-arc/K-Visions)
Audio visual performance software about Kleinian groups. This software is developed for [BSOD 2.0](http://bsod.fukuchilab.org/), experimental event for visual performance.  
![K-Visions](./images/k-visions.png)
+ [Repository on GitHub](https://github.com/soma-arc/K-Visions)  
+ [Demo video at YouTube](https://youtu.be/25cRX5tUwE4)  
+ [Blog post](http://soma.hatenablog.jp/entry/2015/09/04/144335)

### [Parensymphony](https://github.com/soma-arc/parensymphony)
Live coding environment for audio visual performance using lisp (Clojure).  
![parensymphony](./images/parensymphony.png)
+ [Repository on GitHub](https://github.com/soma-arc/parensymphony)
+ [Demo video at YouTube](https://youtu.be/nxhqeIrgpfg)
+ [Blog post](http://soma.hatenablog.jp/entry/2016/01/11/180655)

### [Indra's Bubbles](https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XsGGWG)
Demo using Iterated Inversion System.
2nd place at [Tokyo Demo Fest 2016](http://tokyodemofest.jp/2016/) GLSL Graphics Compo.  
![indra](./images/indra.png)
+ [Demo at Shadertoy](https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XsGGWG)
+ [Blog post](http://soma.hatenablog.jp/entry/2016/02/22/220100)

### [Iterated Inversion System](https://github.com/soma-arc/IteratedInversionSystem)
An algorithm for rendering kissing Schottky groups developed with [Kazushi Ahara](http://www.aharalab.sakura.ne.jp/) (Meiji University)  
![IIS2d](./images/kissingSchottkyLimitSet.png)  
![IIS3d](./images/3dOct.png)  
+ [Repository on GitHub](https://github.com/soma-arc/IteratedInversionSystem)
